import { OrderedList } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storyNumber from '!!raw-loader!./Number'
import storyLetter from '!!raw-loader!./Letter'

<Meta component={OrderedList} title="Docs/OrderedList" />

# OrderedList

The `OrderedList` component renders an `ol` element. Its children should be `li` elements.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## Types

Use the `type` prop to set the `OrderedList`'s marker type.

`OrderedList`s be of type "none" (default) or "number" or "letter".

<Editor code={storyNumber} />
<Editor code={storyLetter} />

<ArgsTable of={OrderedList} exclude={excludedProps} />
